description:
In this course titled ' NLP_ Let Go Of Your Anxiety Of An Important Future Event '. By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn many NLP techniques which are simple and powerful to help you overcome anxiety , fear, nervousness etc before a very important future event of your life . It could be your wedding, your first date , an important meeting/presentation or even your first performance on stage .

Anxiety is just a state of mind and an internal dialogue that you tell yourself which can lower your confidence, Using powerful techniques in this course like anchoring , circle of excellence , mind triggers , relaxation etc you will be able to overcome that anxiety easily and effortlessly and achieve your desired success .

This course is in English and contains more than 30 minutes of video content and designed over 8 lectures

This course contains -

  • Lecture1:Introduction
  • Lecture2:Learn How Your Internal Dialogue Affects Your Feelings And Mental State
  • Lecture3:Self Hypnosis Relaxation – Simple Relaxation Technique Using Self Hypnosis
  • Lecture4:Anchoring Relaxation – Learn How To Use NLP Anchoring Technique For Relaxation
  • Lecture5:Anchoring Confidence – Create An Anchor For Confidence
  • Lecture6:Reverse Spin Technique – Learn How To Reverse The Feeling Of Failure
  • Lecture7:Circle Of Excellence For Confidence
  • Lecture8:Summary
title: NLP- Let Go Of Your Anxiety Of An Important Future Event
